label: Build
command: TOOL="$HOME/ncs/toolchains/b2ecd2435d"; export PATH="$TOOL/bin:$TOOL/usr/bin:$TOOL/usr/local/bin:$TOOL/opt/bin:$TOOL/opt/nanopb/generator-bin:$TOOL/nrfutil/bin:$TOOL/opt/zephyr-sdk/arm-zephyr-eabi/bin:$TOOL/opt/zephyr-sdk/riscv64-zephyr-elf/bin:$PATH"; export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$TOOL/lib:$TOOL/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu:$TOOL/usr/local/lib:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH:-}"; export GIT_EXEC_PATH="$TOOL/usr/local/libexec/git-core"; export GIT_TEMPLATE_DIR="$TOOL/usr/local/share/git-core/templates"; export PYTHONHOME="$TOOL/usr/local"; export PYTHONPATH="$TOOL/usr/local/lib/python3.12:$TOOL/usr/local/lib/python3.12/site-packages"; export NRFUTIL_HOME="$TOOL/nrfutil/home"; export ZEPHYR_TOOLCHAIN_VARIANT="zephyr"; export ZEPHYR_SDK_INSTALL_DIR="$TOOL/opt/zephyr-sdk"; source "$HOME/ncs/v3.1.1/zephyr/zephyr-env.sh"; "$TOOL/usr/local/bin/python3" -m west --version; "$TOOL/usr/local/bin/python3" -m west build -d "$ZED_WORKTREE_ROOT/build" -b xiao_ble/nrf52840/sense -p always "$ZED_WORKTREE_ROOT"
